name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D新衣装お披露目】宝鐘マリン生誕3D LIVE ！！重大告知あり！ゲスト多数＆サクラ大戦から豪華ゲストも！！【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】#宝鐘マリ [1WbyakjUmsI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Title card for Houshou Marine's Birthday 3D LIVE stream with major announcement teasers.
Highlight reel montage of previous events and song performances.
scenes.song_name: スキスキDieスキ超Ayeシテル

scenes.description: Animated segment: Houshou Marine meets with Shirogane Noel, Usada Pekora, and Shiranui Flare to discuss the outfit for the live performance.
3D Live performance of the song 'Suki Suki Die Suki Chou Aye Shiteru'.
scenes.song_name: スキスキDieスキ超Ayeシテル

subtitles.english: If you understand the contract, give me an answer

subtitles.original: 感服しました負けました　地獄最高！

subtitles.english: I told you to wait, didn't I?

subtitles.english: I'm in high spirits, elegantly acting out like this, Marine's...
